title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 

31A(6A)) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 21st day of 

September 2020. 

Prescription of relevant provisions for purposes of Criminal Justice 
(Enforcement Powers) (Covid 19) Act 2020
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a(6a)) (covid-19) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 21st day september 2020 prescription relevant provision purpose criminal justice (enforcement powers) (covid 19) act 2020

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The following provisions of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
2. The following provisions of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 5) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 352 of 
2020), being penal provisions for the purposes of section 31A of the Health Act 
1947 (No. 28 of 1947), are prescribed to be relevant provisions for the 
purposes of the Criminal Justice (Enforcement Powers) (Covid -19) Act 2020 
(No. 14 of 2020): 

(a) paragraphs (1) and (3) of Regulation 10; 

(b) paragraphs (1) and (2) of Regulation 12; 

(c) 

paragraphs (1) and (3) of Regulation 19; 

(d) paragraphs (1) and (2) of Regulation 20. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [354] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 September, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [354]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations provide for the penal provisions relating to premises licensed 
for the sale or supply of intoxicating liquor for consumption on the premises 
under the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(No. 5) Regulations (S.I. No. 352 of 2020) to become relevant provisions for 
the purposes of the Criminal Justice (Enforcement Powers) (Covid-19) Act
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation provide penal provision relating premise licensed sale supply intoxicating liquor consumption premise health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 5) regulation (s.i no 352 2020) become relevant provision purpose criminal justice (enforcement powers) (covid-19) act

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2020. The Regulations remain in operation until 10 October 2020.
text_raw:
2020. The Regulations remain in operation until 10 October 2020.
